title: Mas vs. O’Connor vs. Carapaz: Three-Way TT Battle for Vuelta’s Final Podium
content:
Full start times for Sunday's thrilling time trial finale at the Vuelta a España: Who will end up on the final podium behind Primož Roglič?

Read the full article at Mas vs. O’Connor vs. Carapaz: Three-Way TT Battle for Vuelta’s Final Podium on Velo.
author: ahood
